description:
The Rocpecker eliminates the need for fastening collettes or pins that can compromise reliability. The design simply imitates the SDS function found on power drills. Just slide the drill bit into the chuck, and you’re ready to go.

  • Short for less levering
  • Takes any SDS-compatible bits with shanks up to 0.5 in
  • Leash included
name: Petzl Rocpec Hand Drill
